column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: library. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix ex: <http://example.com/> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .ex:Library rdf:type owl:Class ;ex:hasBook rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;      rdfs:domain ex:Library ;      rdfs:range ex:Book .ex:Book rdf:type owl:Class .ex:hasAuthor rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;       rdfs:domain ex:Book ;       rdfs:range ex:Author .ex:Author rdf:type owl:Class .ex:hasGenre rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;      rdfs:domain ex:Book ;      rdfs:range ex:Genre .ex:Genre rdf:type owl:Class .ex:hasNumberOfBooks rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;      rdfs:domain ex:Library ;      rdfs:range xsd:integer .ex:authorName rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;      rdfs:domain ex:Author ;      rdfs:range xsd:string .ex:bookTitle rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;      rdfs:domain ex:Book ;      rdfs:range xsd:string .ex:genreName rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;      rdfs:domain ex:Genre ;      rdfs:range xsd:string .```
